alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 29 at 2:35PM PDT until April 02 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 21 to 48 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, Northern Oregon Cascades and Cascades in Lane County. In Washington, South Washington Cascades. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A Winter Storm Watch means hazardous winter weather conditions such as heavy snow, blowing and drifting snow, sleet, freezing rain and extreme wind chills are favorable in and close to the watch area in the next 12 to 48 hours, but not imminent.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades
